section.title: cmd_supported

entry.para: Forces the card to stop transmission
Length for SC card is set
Card transfers data blocks to host until interrupted by a STOP_TRANSMISSION command
Continuously writes blocks of data until 'Stop Tran' token is sent
Sets the address of the first write block to be erased.
Sets the address of the last write block of the continuous range to be erased.
Erases all previously selected write blocks
Turns the CRC option on or off
